title: Cumin Spiced Couscous Salad
ingredients: ['175g couscous', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon salt or to taste', '300ml boiling water', '1 clove unpeeled garlic', '1 (400g) tin black beans, rinsed and drained', '165g tinned sweetcorn, drained', '85g finely chopped red onion', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '1 Scotch bonnet chilli or to taste, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons fresh lime juice or to taste']
